EmailTemplate.name: AP Undeliverable damaged
EmailTemplate.subject: We have an update on your delivery for case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery was unable to be completed, please contact the sender for a resolution
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We now have a tracking update and can recommend some next steps.
Your delivery has been located and we are sorry to advise that it has been identified as having been damaged in transit. We will reach out to the sender to advise on this and to determine how they would like to proceed. We recommend you get in touch with the sender to discuss the situation and how they can help. If the parcel is delivered damaged, you can absolutely let us know by reply email and we’ll get back to you with the next steps.
Australia Post
